name: The Virtual Museum of Dead-Wifery
storyline: Meet Mrs. Groan- in exciting color. The didactic meets the sensational when "America's Favoritest Little Dead Wife 2008" explores the moral perils of "Wife Gaming"- taking viewers on an odyssey filled with lessons sure to make you laugh and cry.
